GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 3 of 2023
Date of Assent: 14th April, 2023
An Act to provide for the accreditation of examination
centres; provide for the administration of examinations;
continue the existence of the Examinations Council of
Zambia and re-define its functions; constitute the Board
of the Examinations Council of Zambia and provide for its
functions; repeal and replace the Examinations Council
of Zambia Act, 1983; and provide for matters connected
with, or incidental to, the foregoing.
[18th April, 2023
